content: keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see the shadows it s what the sunflowers do - helen keller this very warm and cozy hat knit in worsted weight yarn has a double layer colorwork brim with stylized sunflowers it is a tribute to the courage and determination of the ukrainian people this pattern will be offered for free - until the ukrainian people have freed their country this pattern is also free from the wool-aid pattern store as well this is another charity that is well worth checking out 1 wool-aid is a community of knitters and crocheters who create warm woolen garments for children who live in the coldest climates and have the least access to resources check out their very active and welcoming ravelry forum 2 in lieu of charging for this pattern please consider donating to the many worthy relief agencies that are helping in ukraine 3 ** solidarity socks 4 ** is a companion pattern to this hat during <del>the month of may</del> all of 2022 100% of net sales will be donated to world central kitchen 1 https //www wool-aid org 2 https //www ravelry com/groups/wool-aid 3 https //www npr org/2022/02/25/1082992947/ukraine-support-help 4 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/solidarity-socks
